articles.title: DPRK to Scrap All Points Agreed with S. Korea over Political and Military Issues
articles.content:
DPRK to Scrap All Points Agreed with S. Korea over Political and Military Issues
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement Friday in connection with the situation on the Korean Peninsula growing tenser as the days go by due to the south Korean conservative authorities' reckless moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Citing facts to prove that the Lee Myung Bak group, far from reflecting on the treacheries of pushing the north-south relations to a serious crisis, shamelessly is challenging the north, raising a hue and cry over the "threat from the north" and "adherence to principle," the statement said:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have reached such pass that there is neither way to improve them nor hope to bring them on track. The confrontation between the north and the south in the political and military fields has been put to such extremes that the inter-Korean relations have reached the brink of a war.
					
					 The group of traitors has already reduced all the agreements reached between the north and the south in the past to dead documents.
					
					 Under such situation it is self-evident that there is no need for the DPRK to remain bound to those north-south agreements.
					
					 The statement vehemently denounced on behalf of all the Koreans the Lee group for having pushed the inter-Korean relations to the brink of a war through its moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK in gross violation of the inter-Korean agreements.
					
					 In view of the prevailing situation the statement solemnly clarified as follows:
					
					 First, all the agreed points concerning the issue of putting an end to the political and military confrontation between the north and the south will be nullified.
					
					 Second, the Agreement on Reconciliation, Non-aggression, Cooperation and Exchange between the North and the South and the points on the military boundary line in the West Sea stipulated in its appendix will be nullified.
					
					 Holding the Lee Myung Bak group wholly accountable for the present grave situation to which the inter-Korean relations have been pushed, the statement continued:
					
					 Never to be condoned are the crimes the Lee group has committed against the nation and reunification by bedeviling overnight the inter-Korean relations that had favorably developed amidst the support and encouragement of all the Koreans and ruthlessly scrapping the inter-Korean agreements.
					
					 The Lee group seems to wait for something, calling for "adhering to the principle" but it will only face a heavier blow and shameful destruction.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Indian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Indian President
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Pratibha Patil, President of the Republic of India, at the news that former president Ramaswamy Venkataraman died of illness. 
					 Kim in the message expressed deep condolences to the president and, through him, to the bereaved family.

articles.title: Greetings to AU Ordinary Session
articles.content:
Greetings to AU Ordinary Session
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to the 12th ordinary session of the assembly of heads of state and government of the African Union on Friday.
					 Kim in the message extended warm congratulations and salute to all heads of state and government and delegates attending the ordinary session on behalf of the government of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in connection with the opening of the session in Addis Ababa.
					
					 He said that the initiatives taken by the AU and its efforts to achieve peace and stability of the Continent and facilitate the political and economic integration give strong impetus to the common cause of developing countries to meet all challenges and establish a fair and impartial international order in the present times.
					
					 Extending firm support and solidarity to the African people in their just cause of building an independent, peaceful and prosperous continent, he once again reiterated the invariable stand of the DPRK government to boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member states in a more multi-faceted manner in the future.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that the ordinary session would yield fine results in line with the desire and expectation of its member states to mark a new occasion in positively promoting the development of the infrastructure of Africa, accelerating the regional integration and strengthening the organization of the union.

articles.title: Earthen Walls and Road of Koguryo Discovered
articles.content:
Earthen Walls and Road of Koguryo Discovered
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Archaeological Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences has of late discovered two earthen walls and remains of a road belonging to Koguryo in the area of Mt. Jangsu in Sinwon County, South Hwanghae Province.
					Two earthen walls (one in Ayang-ri and another in Toma-dong) and remains of a road of city Ribang (one of the medieval city blocks) in Namphyongyang of Koguryo, roofing tiles, a stone pillar for a granite stone lantern, an octagonal base stone and many other relics showing the advanced culture of Koguryo were discovered in the course of a recent survey and unearthing.
					
					 Also the remains are an ancient housing site and the site of a temple belonging to Koryo.
					
					 The Ayang-ri earthen wall is located in the ri seat in Sinwon County to the south of Mt. Jangsu wall. It is the remain of the wall of a royal palace built after the mid-fourth century when Koguryo was actively advancing to the south. The Toma-dong earthen wall was built to reinforce the defense of the south gate of the outer wall of Mt. Jangsu wall.
					
					The archaeological team found that the circumference of the Ayang-ri earthen wall was 2.5 kilometers and confirmed its structure and building method.
					
					 The remains of the road indicating that the city Ribang was in Namphyongyang were found within the Ayang-ri earthen wall and in the Woldang-ri area across River Jaeryong.
					
					The remains of the road inside the Ayang-ri earthen wall were discovered 50 centimeters underground. It is 2.9 meters wide and the stones covering it are about 20 centimeters thick.
					
					 Remains of roads respectively 2.6 meters and 4 meters wide were found in Woldang-ri.
					
					 The relics and remains are very valuable materials in shedding light on the scope of the city of Namphyongyang which was built as the secondary capital of Koguryo and base for advance to the south to unify the three kingdoms and on the style of the planning of the city consisting of the mountain wall, the royal palace wall and the large city extending before it.

articles.title: Ever-Victorious Banner of Korean Revolution
articles.content:
Ever-Victorious Banner of Korean Revolution
Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il published the famous work "The Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line in Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" in January Juche 92 (2003), in which he said that the Songun politics is an invincible one and an almighty precious sword for the victory of the revolution.
					It is a serious lesson left by the world socialist movement in the 20th century that if priority is given to military affairs the revolution wins victory after victory, but if it is neglected the revolution is destined to undergo twists and turns and to collapse in the long run.
					
					Basing himself on a scientific analysis of the changed world political situation and the international environment facing the Korean revolution, leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth President
						Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms, the military affairs and thus advanced the original mode of Songun politics.
					
					Kim Jong Il elucidated the revolutionary principle that a revolution is pioneered and emerges victorious by dint of arms and the Songun principle that the socialist cause is accomplished by the leading and pivotal role of a revolutionary army not in a quiet library but in the course of directly leading the decisive struggle to defend the motherland and socialism on the forefront for the cause of anti-imperialism and independence, and formulated them into a new political mode.
					
					Songun politics is a political mode based on the theory and principle of the great Juche idea and politics of anti-imperialism and independence and politics loving the country, nation and people which make it possible to safeguard and exercise the sovereignty of a country in reliance upon invincible military strength. It thus becomes the most powerful, dignified and independent politics.
					
					The validity and vitality of great Songun politics which have already been proved through the historical practice of the Korean revolution are being displayed more eloquently in the struggle of the DPRK which is defending with credit the dignity of the country and the nation in the confrontation with the formidable enemy which styles itself the "only superpower" and in the efforts for working miraculous changes in all fields of the society in the most rigorous period.
					
					Fully aware of their mission of the times and conscious that to faithfully uphold and implement the Songun revolutionary line is the highest level of patriotism and loyalty, the servicepersons and people of Korea will more vigorously wage the struggle for defending socialism and the efforts for building a great, prosperous and powerful nation with inexhaustible mental power under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A resolution critical of Israel's atrocities against humanity was adopted at a recent special session of the UN Human Rights Council. South Korea, however, abstained from voting there, pursuant to the U.S. policy of defending Israel.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's behavior of refraining from censuring Israel for its wanton human rights abuses is, in fact, an undisguised disregard of human rights and a challenge to those rights as it is little short of supporting and siding with man-killers. 
					
					 The disgusting behavior of the group of traitors fully discloses the deceptive and reactionary nature of its call for "the universally recognized human rights" and the absurdity and hypocrisy of the anti-DPRK row over its "human rights issue." 
					
					 By nature, the Lee regime is not entitled to talk about "human rights".
					
					 A crow can not become white with often washing. The group of traitors is loudly vociferating about "human rights" but it is no more than a farce to cover up its despicable true colors as a human rights abuser.
					
					 It is quite illogical to talk about "human rights" in south Korea where innocent people are meeting grievous deaths subject to fascist suppression, being deprived of the elementary right to existence.
					
					 This group is working desperately to harm the DPRK while trumpeting about hypocritical "human rights" while shelving the crimes it has committed by converting south Korea into a tundra of human rights. This will get it nowhere.
					
					 The group of traitors would be well advised to immediately stop its poor racket over the "human rights issue" in the DPRK and settle so many human rights issues in the south Korean society.

articles.title: DPRK's Firm Stand to Defend Peace and Security in Northeast Asia Reiterated
articles.content:
DPRK's Firm Stand to Defend Peace and Security in Northeast Asia Reiterated
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- It is a steadfast foreign policy of the DPRK to ensure peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The DPRK has made every sincere effort to protect peace and security in Northeast Asia in the past. 
					
					 Military tension in Northeast Asia is inching close to a more acute phase as the days go by, far from easing. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy for aggression. 
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. imperialists that they cannot realize their scenario for world domination without putting under their control the Asia-Pacific which abounds in natural resources, markets and manpower and is located in the region of military and strategic importance. 
					
					 The U.S. warmongers seek to ensure the upper-hand of strength and reinforce their strategic position in Northeast Asia and start another Korean war in a bid to get rid of their political and economic crises and build a uni-polar world.
					
					 Nothing is more urgent at present than ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 In order to achieve peace in Northeast Asia, it is important, first of all, to get foreign military bases dismantled and foreign troops withdrawn from the region and foil the imperialists' moves for domination and interference.
					
					Peace in Northeast Asia can be achieved only through the concerted efforts and common struggle of the people of the countries in the region. They should check and frustrate the moves of the aggressor forces for war by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 A war has not broken out but peace has been preserved in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula so far entirely thanks to the efforts exerted by the DPRK to bolster its military deterrent. Had the DPRK not reacted to the U.S. offensive to stifle it with nuclear weapons by increasing its self-reliant defence capability, the Korean Peninsula would have already turned into a theatre of a nuclear war, bringing nuclear disasters not only to Northeast Asia but to the rest of the world. 
					
					 The Korean people will as ever intensify the struggle against the imperialists' aggression and war moves to ensure peace and security in Northeast Asia including the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world and thus positively contribute to the human cause of peace and independence.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il' Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates a signed article to the 6th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution."
					 The work published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003) expounds ideas and theories that the Songun politics enforced by the Workers' Party of Korea is the most effective and dignified politics of independence as it is based on President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms and military affairs and regards them as a starting point and correctly reflects the requirements of the era and the revolution and embodies the Juche idea, the original socialist political mode which found a new solution to the issue concerning the main force of the revolution, the article notes, and continues: 
					
					 The WPK's Songun politics means a political mode which calls for turning the Korean People's Army into invincible armed forces in order to defend the country, firmly building a driving force of the revolution regarding the KPA as the core and model and vigorously accelerating the overall socialist construction with the KPA as a mainstay of the revolution.
					
					One can emerge victorious in the revolution and protect the victory in revolution only when depending on the strong military force. This is the steadfast will and faith of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the Songun tradition of Mt. Paektu provided by the President came to shed its rays as the eternal cornerstone of the Party and the revolution and epoch-making miracles and changes have taken place in the socialist construction. The Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il over the last more than decade, in particular, has brought about a historic turn in the struggle to defend Korean-style socialism and build a great prosperous powerful nation. This is an immortal feat to be specially recorded in the history of the country. 
					
					 The DPRK has emerged an invincible socialist political and military power having ever-victorious armed forces, the single-minded unity and powerful war deterrent. All its fields are making dynamic progress by dint of national economic potential the core of which is national defence industry. This is the stirring reality of the country, a product of the Songun politics.
					
					 The Korean people have firmly protected the sovereign dignity of the country by foiling all moves of the U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries for aggression in reliance upon the mighty military force built under the banner of Songun. 
					
					 The international prestige and influence of the DPRK are on the daily increase and it has positively developed the friendly and cooperative relations with many countries of the world.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that Songun means the sovereign dignity of the country and the nation and it was entirely right for the DPRK to have followed the road of Songun, fastening its belt.

articles.title: Lee's Intention to Appoint Anti-Reunification Element as Minister of "Unification" Accused
articles.content:
Lee's Intention to Appoint Anti-Reunification Element as Minister of "Unification" Accused
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea issued a statement on January 21 in which it accused the "government" of informally designating Hyon In Thaek, professor at Korea University, as minister of "Unification" recently.
					 The statement charged that Hyon is one of the architects of the present regime's undisguised policy for confrontation with the DPRK the keynote of which is "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" and advocates of south Korea's participation in PSI aimed at igniting a war of aggression against the north and the U.S. missile defense system. 
					
					 Hyon was so hell-bent on the moves to bedevil the inter-Korean relations while involving himself in diplomacy and other affairs that he is called "tutor" for the Lee Myung Bak regime in the past one year, it noted, and continued:
					
					 After coming to power, Lee Myung Bak informally designated an ultra-right conservative as minister of "Unification" but he was forced to retract it by the protest and condemnation from the people. Lee's informal designation of such anti-reunification element as Hyon as the above-said minister in less than one year since then is as foolish an act as adding fuel to the flames.
					
					 Such rash action of Lee Myung Bak is nothing but a deliberate move to drive the worst inter-Korean relations to the phase of severance. 
					
					 The statement called for forcing the Lee regime to step down without fail as it is making desperate efforts to scrap the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration at any cost through an alliance of anti-DPRK and anti-reunification conservative forces.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Mexico to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Mexico to Mark Kim Jong Il's Birthday
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism issued the 18th issue of its bulletin carrying a picture of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The bulletin in an article said that Kim Jong Il has warm love and deep trust in the people.
					
					 The political idea of believing in the people as in Heaven is his motto, and it is his outlook on the people that a flower should be cultivated on a stone and a star picked up from the sky if the people want, the bulletin stressed.
					
					 It said that his love and trust in the people are expressed in the fact that he has relied on the people in doing any work and devoted his all to the people.
					
					 He always remains true to the slogan "We Serve the People!" it added.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Arab Organization
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Supported by Arab Organization
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Arab Solidarity Committee to Support the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and the South Korean People's Struggle issued a statement supporting the joint New Year editorial on Jan. 5.
					 The statement described the joint editorial as a bright beacon illuminating the road ahead of the Korean people's struggle to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and achieve national reunification as soon as possible.
					
					 Noting that the militant task for achieving national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" and ways for its implementation laid down in the joint editorial are most just and realistic, the statement reaffirmed the committee's firm support and solidarity with the struggle of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and the south Korean people.
					
					 The statement bitterly denounced the frenzied moves of the U.S. imperialists and the group of traitors in south Korea, their stooges, to step up the preparations for a war of aggression against the DPRK and demanded the south Korean authorities immediately repeal the "National Security Law", a fascist law, and halt at once the crackdown upon the patriotic figures and organizations struggling for independence and reunification.
					
					 The statement stressed that a joint struggle would be waged to drive the U.S. imperialists out of different parts of the world.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days to Be Marked in France
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days to Be Marked in France
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated in Paris on Jan. 22.
					 Andre Aubry, delegate president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful functions on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and February 16.

articles.title: CRPP anuncia anulacion de articulos acordados entre Norte y Sur
articles.content:
CRPP anuncia anulacion de articulos acordados entre Norte y Sur
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ATCC) -- Con motivo de que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna cada dia mas tensa debido a la imprudente campana de confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lanzada por las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 30 una declaracion.
					Citando datos, la nota revela que la descarada camarilla de Lee Myung Bak se porta de manera desafiante hablando tanto del "chantaje del Norte" y del supuesto "mantenimiento del principio" en lugar de arrepentirse seriamente por su crimen antinacional de haber llevado las relaciones N-S a una grave crisis.
					
					Ya no hay la manera ni esperanza de remediar las relaciones Norte-Sur, adelanta la nota y prosigue:
					
					La confrontacion politico-militar entre ambas partes coreanas es tan extremada que llego al borde de guerra en que se enfrentaran el fuego con el fuego y el hierro con el hierro.
					
					Por culpa de la horda del traidor Lee, todos los acuerdos alcanzados anteriormente entre el Norte y el Sur ya se han convertido en letras muertas.
					
					En estas condiciones, es obvio que la RPDC no necesita comprometerse unilateralmente a los anteriores acuerdos Norte-Sur.
					
					El CRPP denuncia categoricamente en nombre de toda la nacion coreana a los compinches de Lee, quienes en virtud de su politica conflictiva con la RPDC, invalidaron por completo los anteriores acuerdos intercoreanos y llevaron las relaciones N-S a la peor situacion a punto de guerra, y declara solemnemente los siguientes puntos frente a la situacion creada:
					
					Primero, Invalidamos todas las clausulas acordadas para eliminar el estado de confrontacion politico-militar entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					 Segundo, Cancelamos los articulos sobre la linea de demarcacion militar maritima en el Mar Oeste de Corea, que fueron incluidos en el "Acuerdo sobre la reconciliacion, la no-agresion, la cooperacion y el intercambio entre el Norte y el Sur" y su anexo.
					
					 La camarilla de Lee Myung Bak es totalmente responsable por las relaciones intercoreanas que cayeron en la peor coyuntura de ahora.
					
					 No se pueden perdonar jamas los crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion de la banda de Lee que rompio de un tiron las relaciones intercoreanas, que marchaban positivamente bajo el respaldo y apoyo de todos los connacionales, y violo flagrantemente los acuerdos intercoreanos.
					
					 A esta horda, que espera algo abogando por el supuesto "mantenimiento del principio", le tocaran el castigo mas temible y el arruinamiento bochornoso.

articles.title: Halladas dos murallas de barro en alrededores del monte Jangsu
articles.content:
Halladas dos murallas de barro en alrededores del monte Jangsu
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Instituto Arqueologico de la Academia de Ciencias Sociales descubrio dos murallas de barro de Coguryo (primer Estado Feudal de Corea existido desde 277 a.n.e. hasta 668 n.e.): una en la comuna de Ayang y la otra en el barrio de Toma y nuevas instalaciones viales en alrededores del monte Jangsu del distrito de Sinwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					En el proceso de la investigacion fueron descubiertos junto con dos murallas de barro las reliquias viales de Ribang que es una manzana urbana en la edad media en Namphyongyang de Coguryo, tejas, la columna de granito que sostiene lampara de piedra, el sosten de piedra octagonal y otros objetos que representan la excelencia cultural de Coguryo.
					
					Ademas, fueron hallados un solar de la epoca antigua, terreno del templo del periodo de Coryo (un Estado Feudal de Corea existido desde principios del siglo X hasta finales del siglo XIV), etc.
					
					La muralla de barro de la comuna de Ayang en la cabecera de la comuna homonima del distrito de Sinwon al sur de la ciudadela del monte Jangsu es la reliquia del palacio real construida en el periodo posterior a mediados del siglo IV cuando Coguryo habia activado la salida al Sur. Y la muralla de barro en el barrio de Toma fue erguida para reforzar mas la defensa de la puerta Sur del castillo exterior de la ciudadela del monte Jangsu.
					
					El resultado de investigacion de estas murallas dio confirmacion sobre el perimetro de la muralla de la comuna de Ayang (2.5 km), la estructura y el metodo constructivo de sus paredes.
					
					Las susodichas reliquias viales fueron descubiertas en el recinto interior de la muralla de barro de la comuna de Ayang y la zona de la comuna de Woldang al lado opuesto del rio Jaeryong.
					
					 Las instalaciones viales de la muralla de barro de la comuna de Ayang fueron descubiertas en 50 cm de profundo desde la superficie de la tierra. Segun el resultado de averiguacion, la carretera era de 2.9m de ancho y cubierta de piedras de 20 cm de grueso.
					
					 Las instalaciones viales de la zona de la comuna de Woldang eran de 2.6m, 4m, de ancho.
					
					Estas reliquias y objetos historicos tienen gran valor para aclarar la dimension de la ciudad de Namphyongyang que sirvio de subcapital y puesto de apoyo a la salida al Sur de Coguryo para realizar la unificacion de tres Estados y la forma de constitucion urbana compuesta con la ciudadela, el palacio real y la gran ciudad situada delante de estos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta abstencion de Sur de Corea en votacion en ONU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta abstencion de Sur de Corea en votacion en ONU
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ATCC) -- En la reciente reunion extraordinaria del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU fue aprobada la resolucion condenando las atrocidades antieticas de Israel. 
					En la votacion de ella el Sur de Corea cometio la locura de abstenerse siguiendo a Estados Unidos que ampara al pais sionista.
					
					 En un comentario individual publicado hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun subraya que abstenerse de condenar a Israel, que violo flagrantemente los DDHH, significa un gesto de apoyo a los asesinos siendo abierto desprecio y desafio a los DDHH, y prosigue:
					
					Tal comportamiento repugnante de la camarilla traidora de Lee Myung Bak demuestra claramente el caracter enganoso y reaccionario de los "derechos humanos generales", de que ella habla tanto, y lo absurdo e intrigante de la campana anti-RPDC lanzada por ella en el terreno de DDHH.
					
					Como reza el refran "El mono se viste siempre de seda", la camarilla traidora aboga con fanfarroneria por la "defensa de los DDHH", lo cual no pasa de ser una payasada para ocultar su asquerosa fachada de violador de DDHH.
					
					 Resulta ilogico abordar este asunto en la actual realidad del Sur de Corea donde se viola hasta el elemental derecho a la vida de los habitantes y mueren los moradores inocentes acribillados por los sablazos del fascismo.
					
					Sin embargo, la banda de Lee se mueve con fanatismo por calumniar a la RPDC a traves de esa intrigante campana contra esta en el campo de DDHH silenciando su crimen de haber convertido el suelo surcoreano en la tierra esteril para DDHH.
					
					Esta accion tan atrevida no puede ser aceptada en ninguna parte.
					
					 Esa horda debe parar su pueril campana de DDHH anti-RPDC y resolver primero un monton de problemas de la misma materia que hay en la sociedad surcoreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun senala posicion de RPDC en paz de Nordeste Asiatico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun senala posicion de RPDC en paz de Nordeste Asiatico
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ATCC) -- Preservar la paz y la seguridad en el Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo es la invariable politica exterior de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					En el pasado la RPDC hizo todos sus esfuerzos sinceros por defender la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste asiatico.
					
					Hoy dia, se torna cada dia mas aguda la tension militar en esta region, lo cual se debe enteramente a la estrategia agresiva de Estados Unidos con respecto al Asia-Pacifico 
					
					 EE.UU. sabe que no puede realizar su ambicion de hegemonia mundial sin tomar la region Asia-Pacifico donde abundan recursos naturales, mercados y la mano de obra y que ocupa una posicion importante en el sentido estrategico-militar.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos intentan fortalecer la supremacia de la fuerza y la posicion estrategica en esta region y  provocar la segunda guerra coreana  con el fin de liberarse de la crisis politica y economica y establecer el mundo unipolarizado.  
					
					No hay el problema mas apremiante que el de preservar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana en el Nordeste asiatico.
					
					Para este efecto es necesario, ante todo, cancelar las bases militares en esta region,  retirar de ahi las tropas extranjeras y frustrar las maquinaciones del dominio e intervencion de los imperialistas.
					
					La paz de esta region sera posible solo por la fuerza unida y la lucha comun de los pueblos de esta region. Estos pueblos deben frenar con sus fuerzas unidas las maquinaciones belicas de las fuerzas agresivas.
					
					Hasta la fecha no estallo la guerra sino se preserva la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico, lo cual se debe enteramente a los esfuerzos de la RPDC por intensificar la disuasion militar. 
					
					Si la RPDC no hubiera fortalecido la fuerza de autodefensa nacional frente a la ofensiva de aplastamiento nuclear de EE.UU. contra ella, la Peninsula Coreana se habria convertido ya en el campo de guerra nuclear y debido a eso, la region del Nordeste Asiatico y el resto del mundo habrian sufrido calamidades nucleares.
					
					En el futuro tambien el pueblo coreano hara contribucion activa al cumplimiento de la causa de la paz, la de la independencia de la humanidad al fortalecer la lucha contra las maquinaciones de agresion y guerra de los imperialistas para preservar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana, el Nordeste asiatico y el resto del mundo.
